titles.title: I've made up my mind, no compromise

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've made up my mind, no compromise
I will live for You
Because of the Cross and what it cost
I will go for You

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
Shout His name out, Jesus
Shout His name out, Jesus

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Whoa! I am not ashamed of You
Whoa! I'm singing it loud
Whoa! I am living for You now
No matter what the cost I'll go

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
This praise is rising in my soul
I can't contain it any more
I just have to dance
